response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
